author: Wladimir Palant
content: Great, the last thing the world needs is yet another way of sending raw TCP data. On the other hand, Java and Flash do this already...

author: Matt
content:
Is this API downloadable yet? 

I also noticed that you used a closure in your function declaration of the event handler so it is definitely not Java. Is it JavaScript perchance?

author: pdp
content: well TCPSocket is already implemented into Firefox but it is not part of the DOM. So, this draft suggests that the object it should be part of it and in a year or two, that might be the case.
